scripts.test: npm run lint -- --fix && npm run test-boilerplate
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run ci-boilerplate
scripts.test-boilerplate: npm run build && npm run install-deps && cd dist && npm test
scripts.test-boilerplate-from-cnpm: npm run build && npm run install-deps-from-cnpm && cd dist && npm test
scripts.ci-boilerplate: npm run build && npm run install-deps && cd dist && npm run ci
scripts.ci-boilerplate-from-cnpm: npm run build && npm run install-deps-from-cnpm && cd dist && npm run ci
